name: budget
description: A simple budget tracker using Bootstrap 4 and Angular 2!
author: Chris Gaona (https://github.com/chris-gaona)

scripts.test:all: npm run lint && ng test --single-run && mocha server/test.js && npm run e2e
scripts.uglify:config: mkdir -p dist/server/config && uglifyjs server/config/database.js -m -c -o dist/server/config/database.js && uglifyjs server/config/passport.js -m -c -o dist/server/config/passport.js
scripts.uglify:models: mkdir -p dist/server/models && uglifyjs server/models/Budgets.js -m -c -o dist/server/models/Budgets.js && uglifyjs server/models/Users.js -m -c -o dist/server/models/Users.js
scripts.uglify:routes: mkdir -p dist/server/routes && uglifyjs server/routes/index.js -m -c -o dist/server/routes/index.js && uglifyjs server/routes/auth.js -m -c -o dist/server/routes/auth.js && uglifyjs server/routes/budgets.js -m -c -o dist/server/routes/budgets.js && uglifyjs server/routes/users.js -m -c -o dist/server/routes/users.js
scripts.copy: cp -R src/css dist/client/css/ && cp -R server/bin dist/server/bin/
scripts.server:build: npm run uglify:config && npm run uglify:models && npm run uglify:routes && npm run uglify:main
scripts.build: npm run clean && ng build --prod --output-path=dist/client && npm run server:build && npm run copy
